K12bsu035_u:388: pūreya ṣaṭpāramitā anuttarā yathaiva pūrvaṃ jinapūrvakānām /

K12bsu035_u:390: jātismaro nitya bhaveya cāhaṃ jātiśatā jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:391: anusmareyaṃ satataṃ munīndraṃ śṛṇvīya teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hyudāram // Suv_4.73 //
K12bsu035_u:393: anena cāhaṃ kuśalena karmaṇā labheya buddhehi sadā samāgamam /
K12bsu035_u:394: vivarjayeyaṃ khalu pāpakarma careya puṇyāni śubhākarāṇi // Suv_4.74 //
K12bsu035_u:395: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca pāpāḥ praśamantu loke /
K12bsu035_u:396: ye sattvā vikalendriya aṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi kuśalendriya bhontu sāṃpratam // Suv_4.75 //
K12bsu035_u:398: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cārogyabalendriyāni // Suv_4.76 //
K12bsu035_u:400: te sarvi sattvā vyasanāgataduḥkhitā hi mucyantu te bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ // Suv_4.77 //
K12bsu035_u:401: ye pīḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu saṃsthitā hi /
K12bsu035_u:403: te sarve mucyantu ca bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyantu ca tāḍanebhyaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:404: vadhyāśca mucyantu jīvitebhyo vyasanāgatā nirbhayā bhontu sarve // Suv_4.79 //
K12bsu035_u:405: ye sattva kṣuttarṣanipīḍitāśca labhantu te bhojanapānacitram /
K12bsu035_u:407: andhāśca paśyantu vicitrarūpān vadhirāśca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān // Suv_4.80 //
K12bsu035_u:408: nagnāśca vastrāṇi labhantu citrā daridrasattvāśca dhanāṃllabhantu /
K12bsu035_u:409: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnāḥ sarve ca sattvāḥ sukhino bhavantu // Suv_4.81 //
K12bsu035_u:410: mā kasyaciddhāvatu duḥkhavedanā sudarśanāḥ sattva bhavantu sarve /
K12bsu035_u:412: manaḥśāntapaurāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ vīṇā mṛdaṅgā paṭahā sughoṣā /
K12bsu035_u:413: utsāḥ sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ suvarṇapadmotpalapadminībhiḥ // Suv_4.83 //
K12bsu035_u:414: sahacittamātreṇa tu teṣa bhontu annaṃ ca pānaṃ ca tathaiva vastram /
K12bsu035_u:416: mā duḥkhaśabdāḥ kvaci loki bhontu bhā caikasattvaḥ pratikūladarśī /
K12bsu035_u:417: sarve ca te bhontu udāravarṇāḥ prabhākarā bhontu paraspareṇa // Suv_4.85 //
K12bsu035_u:418: yā kāci saṃpatti manuṣyaloke sā teṣu bhotū manasopapattiḥ /
K12bsu035_u:420: sarvābhiprāyā sahacittamātraiḥ puṇyena phalena paripūrayantu // Suv_4.86 //
K12bsu035_u:421: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ ca pūrṇam /
K12bsu035_u:422: trikāle vṛkṣehi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te sattva bhavantu tuṣṭāḥ // Suv_4.87 //
K12bsu035_u:423: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām /
K12bsu035_u:425: nīcāṃ gatiṃ sarvi vivarjayantu tarantu aṣṭāṅgikavīcivṛttāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:426: āsādayantu jinarājamūrti labhantu buddhehi sadā samāgamam // Suv_4.89 //
K12bsu035_u:427: uccaiḥ kulīnā hi bhavantu nityaṃ prabhūtadhanadhānyasamṛddhakośāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:428: rūpeṇa śauryeṇa yaśena kīrtyā samalaṅkṛtā bhontu anekakalpān // Suv_4.90 //
K12bsu035_u:429: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāśca vīrāśca vijñapaṇḍitāśca /
K12bsu035_u:430: te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu // Suv_4.91 //
K12bsu035_u:433: vaiḍūryasiṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇān śṛṇvantu dharmāṃśca prakāśyamānān // Suv_4.92 //
K12bsu035_u:434: pāpāni karmāṇi mayā jitāni pūrvārjitā yadbhavasaṃkaṭeṣu /
K12bsu035_u:435: ye pāpakarmābhiratā vahante te sarvi kṣīyantu ca nirviśeṣāḥ // Suv_4.93 //
K12bsu035_u:437: prajñākarairbhāsita bhontu bandhanānmucyantu duḥkhairupajā bhavantu // Suv_4.94 //
K12bsu035_u:438: ye cāpi sattvā iha jāmbudvīpe ye cāpi anyaṣu ca lokadhātuṣu /
K12bsu035_u:441: praṇidhānasiddhiḥ saphalā mayāstu spṛśeya bodhiṃ virajāmanuttarām // Suv_4.96 //
K12bsu035_u:442: yo vandate toṣyati daśabalān sadā ca prasannaśuddhāmalamānasena /
K12bsu035_u:443: imāya pariṇāmanadeśanāya ṣaṣṭiṃ ca kalpān jahate apāyān // Suv_4.97 //
K12bsu035_u:444: etebhi ślokebhi ca varṇitebhiḥ puruṣāḥ striyo brahmaṇakṣatriyā ca /
K12bsu035_u:446: yastoṣyate muniṃ sa kṛtāñjalibhiḥ sthihitva sarvatra jātismaru śatajātiṣu // Suv_4.98 //
K12bsu035_u:448: narendrarājaiśca supūjitaḥ sadā etādṛśo bheṣyati tatra tatra // Suv_4.99 //
K12bsu035_u:449: na tairekasya buddhasya cāntike kuśalaṃ kṛtam /
K12bsu035_u:450: na dvayorapi trayeṣu na pañcasu na daśasu // Suv_4.100 //
K12bsu035_u:457: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena rājā suvarṇabhujendro nāmāsīt /
K12bsu035_u:459: ye jina pūrvaka ye ca bhavanti ye ca dhriyanti daśodiśi loke /
K12bsu035_u:460: teṣa jināna karomi praṇāmaṃ taṃ jinasaṃghamahaṃ praśayiṣye // Suv_5.1 //
K12bsu035_u:477: teṣu ca sarvasukhārpitasattvaṃ sarvapraśānta apāyagatīṣu // Suv_5.9 //
K12bsu035_u:486: te 'pi ca niṣṭhita sarvamabhūṣi buddhaprabhāsavirocanatāyai // Suv_5.13 //
K12bsu035_u:492: sūkṣmarajopama ye ca bhavanti sūkṣmarajopama ye ca sthihanti // Suv_5.16 //
K12bsu035_u:493: teṣa jināna karomi praṇāmaṃ kāyatu vācamanena prasannaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:495: jihvaśatairapi buddhaguṇāni kalpasahasraśate na hi vaktum /
K12bsu035_u:497: ye guṇasādhunivṛtti jinānāṃ sā ca varāgravicitra anekaiḥ // Suv_5.18 //
K12bsu035_u:498: ekajinasya guṇā na hi śakyā jihvaśatairapi bhāṣitu kaścit /
K12bsu035_u:499: kāmamaśakti hi sarvajinānāṃ ekaguṇasya hi vistara vaktum // Suv_5.19 //
K12bsu035_u:501: keśagrahaṇena tu śakya pramātuṃ naiva ca ekaguṇā sugatānām // Suv_5.20 //
K12bsu035_u:502: varṇita saṃstuta me jinasarvaṃ kāyatu vāca prasannamanena /
K12bsu035_u:503: yanmama sañcitapuṇyaphalāgraṃ tena ca sattva prabhotu jinatvam // Suv_5.21 //
K12bsu035_u:504: evaṃ stavitva narapati buddhaṃ evaṃ karoti nṛpaḥ praṇidhānam /
K12bsu035_u:505: yatra ca kutraci mahya bhaveta jāti anāgatakalpamanantā // Suv_5.22 //
K12bsu035_u:506: īdṛśi bheri mi paśyami svapne īdṛśa deśana tatra śṛṇomi /
K12bsu035_u:507: īdṛśa jīnastutikamalākara jātiṣu tatra labhe smaraṇatvam // Suv_5.23 //
K12bsu035_u:508: buddhaguṇāni anantamatulyā ye 'pi ca durlabha kalpasahasraiḥ /
K12bsu035_u:510: amu śruṇeya ca svapnagato 'pi teṣu ca deśayi divasagato 'pi // Suv_5.24 //
K12bsu035_u:511: duḥkhasamudra vimocayi sattvā pūrayi ṣaḍabhi pi pāramitābhiḥ /
K12bsu035_u:512: bodhimanuttara paśca labheyaṃ kṣetra bhaveta mamā asamarthyam // Suv_5.25 //
K12bsu035_u:514: saṃmukha paśyami śākyamunīndraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ hyahu tatra labheyam // Suv_5.26 //
K12bsu035_u:515: ye ima dāraka dvau mama putrau kanakendra kanakaprabhāsvaraḥ /
K12bsu035_u:516: te ubhi dāraka tatra labheyaṃ bodhimanuttara vyākaraṇaṃ ca // Suv_5.27 //
K12bsu035_u:517: ye 'pi ca sattva arakṣa atrāṇā śaraṇavihīna viyāsagatāśca /
K12bsu035_u:518: teṣu bhaveya anāgata sarva trāṇaparāyaṇaśaraṇebhiśca // Suv_5.28 //
K12bsu035_u:520: kalpa anāgata bodhi careyaṃ yattaka pūrvakakoṭigatāśca // Suv_5.29 //
K12bsu035_u:523: karmasamudra vikīryatu mahyaṃ kleśasamudra vicchidyatu mahyam // Suv_5.30 //
K12bsu035_u:524: puṇyasamudra prapūryatu mahyaṃ jñānasamudra viśodhyatu mahyam /
K12bsu035_u:527: puṇyaprabhāsa bhaviṣyati mahyaṃ bodhiprabhāsa viśodhyatu mahyam // Suv_5.32 //
K12bsu035_u:528: kāyaprabhāsa bhaviṣyati mahyaṃ puṇyaprabhāsa virocanatā ca /
K12bsu035_u:529: sarvatriloki viśiṣṭa bhaveyaṃ pūṇyabalena samanvita nityam // Suv_5.33 //
K12bsu035_u:537: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata //
K12bsu035_u:539: tasmādime sūtravarottame vaḥ saṃkṣepato deśita śūnyadharmāḥ // Suv_6.1 //
K12bsu035_u:540: sattvo 'lpabuddhiravijānamāno na śakya jñātuṃ khalu sarvadharmā /
K12bsu035_u:541: paśyeha sūtrendravarottamena saṃkṣepato deśita śūnyadharmāḥ // Suv_6.2 //
K12bsu035_u:543: prakāśitaṃ sūtravarendrametaṃ yathābhijānanti hi sarvasattvāḥ // Suv_6.3 //
K12bsu035_u:544: ayaṃ ca kāyo yatha śūnyagrāmaḥ ṣaḍgrāma coropama indriyāṇi /
K12bsu035_u:545: tānyekagrāme nivasanti sarve na te vijānanti paraspareṇa // Suv_6.4 //
K12bsu035_u:547: ghrāṇendriyaṃ gandhavicitrahāri jihvandriyaṃ nitya raseṣu dhāvati // Suv_6.5 //
K12bsu035_u:550: ṣaḍindriyāṇīti paraspareṇa svakaṃ svakaṃ viṣayamabhidhāvati // Suv_6.6 //
K12bsu035_u:551: cittaṃ hi māyopama cañcalaṃ ca ṣaḍindriyaṃ viṣayavicāraṇaṃ ca /
K12bsu035_u:552: yathā naro dhāvati śūnyagrāme saṃgrāma caurebhi samāśritaśca // Suv_6.7 //
K12bsu035_u:553: cittaṃ yathā ṣaḍviṣayāśritaṃ ca prajānate indriya gocaraṃ ca /
K12bsu035_u:554: rūpaṃ ca śabdaṃ ca tathaiva gandhaṃ rasaṃ ca sparśa tatha dharmagocaram // Suv_6.8 //
K12bsu035_u:555: cittaṃ ca sarvatra ṣaḍindriyeṣu śakuniriva cañcalaṃ indriyasaṃpraviṣṭam /
K12bsu035_u:556: yatra yatrendriyasaṃśritaṃ ca na cendriyaṃ kurvatu jānamātmakam // Suv_6.9 //
K12bsu035_u:557: kāyaśca niśceṣṭa nirvyāpāraṃ ca asārakaḥ pratyayasaṃbhavaśca /
K12bsu035_u:561: paraspareṇaiva sadā viruddhā yathaiva āśīviṣa ekaveśmani // Suv_6.11 //
K12bsu035_u:562: dhātūragāste ca caturvidhāni dve ūrdhvagāmī dvaya heṣṭagāmī /
K12bsu035_u:563: dvayādvayaṃ diśi vidiśāsu sarvaṃ naśyanti tā dhātubhujaṅgamāni // Suv_6.12 //
K12bsu035_u:564: kṣityuragaśca saliloragaśca imau ca heṣṭā kṣayatāṃ vrajete /
K12bsu035_u:565: tejoragaścānilamārutoraga imau hi dve ūrdhvagatau nabho 'nte // Suv_6.13 //
K12bsu035_u:566: cittaṃ ca vijñānamadhyasthitaṃ ca gatvā yathā pūrvakṛtena karmāṇā /
K12bsu035_u:567: deve manuṣyaeṣu ca triṣvapāyā yathākṛtaṃ pūrvabhave pravarttyā // Suv_6.14 //
K12bsu035_u:569: nirābhirāmaḥ kṛmikṣudrapūrṇaḥ kṣiptaḥ śmaśāne yatha kāṣṭhabhūtaḥ // Suv_6.15 //
K12bsu035_u:570: paśyāhi tvaṃ devata ebhi evaṃ katyatra sattvastatha pudgalo vā /
K12bsu035_u:572: śūnyā hi ete khalu sarvadharmā avidyataḥ pratyayasaṃbhavāśca // Suv_6.16 //
K12bsu035_u:574: tasmācca bhūtā hi asaṃbhavāśca avidyamānā na kadāci vidyate // Suv_6.17 //
K12bsu035_u:576: tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā saṃskāravijñāna sanāmarūpam // Suv_6.18 //
K12bsu035_u:577: ṣaḍāyatanasparśa tathaiva vedanā tṛṣṇā upādāna tathā bhavaśca /
K12bsu035_u:578: jātijarāmaraṇaśoka upadravāṇāṃ duḥkhāni saṃskāra acintiyāni // Suv_6.19 //
K12bsu035_u:579: saṃsāracakre ca yathā sthitāni abhūta saṃbhūta asaṃbhavāśca /
K12bsu035_u:580: ayoniśaścittavicāraṇaṃ tathā dṛṣṭīgataṃ chetsyatha ātmanaiva // Suv_6.20 //
K12bsu035_u:581: jñānāsinā chindatha kleśajālaṃ skandhālayaṃ paśyatha śūnyabhūtam /
K12bsu035_u:582: sparśetha taṃ bodhiguṇaṃ hyudāraṃ vivarta ca me amṛtapurasya dvāram // Suv_6.21 //
K12bsu035_u:583: saṃdarśi taṃ amṛtapurasya bhājanaṃ pravekṣya taṃ amṛtapurālayaṃ śubham /
K12bsu035_u:585: tarpiṣya ha amṛtatarasena ātmanāṃ parāhatā me varadharmabherīḥ // Suv_6.22 //
K12bsu035_u:586: āpūrito me varadharmaśaṅkhaḥ prajvālitā me varadharma ulkā /
K12bsu035_u:587: suvarṣitaṃ me varadharmavarṣaṃ parājitā me parakleśaśatravaḥ // Suv_6.23 //
K12bsu035_u:588: ucchrepitaṃ me varadharmadhvajaṃ pratāritā me bhavasattvasamudrāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:589: pidhitāni me 'pāyapathāni trīṇi kleśāgnidāhaṃ śamayitva prāṇinām // Suv_6.24 //
K12bsu035_u:590: yasmāddhi pūrvamahamanekakalpān acintiyā pūjitva nāyakā hi /
K12bsu035_u:591: caritva bodhāya dṛḍhavratena saddharmakāyaṃ pariveṣamāṇaḥ // Suv_6.25 //
K12bsu035_u:592: hastau ca pādau ca parityajitvā dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ maṇimuktabhūṣaṇam /
K12bsu035_u:595: sarvaṃ ca cūrṇayitvā tat kuryāt sūkṣmarajopamam // Suv_6.27 //
K12bsu035_u:599: sarvasattvā aneke hi jñānavata tathaiva ca /
K12bsu035_u:600: sarvaṃ gaṇayituṃ śakyaṃ na tu jñātaṃ jinasya ca // Suv_6.29 //
K12bsu035_u:602: anekakalpakoṭīṣu na śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ kvacit // Suv_6.30 //
K12bsu035_u:606: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo virūḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo
K12bsu035_u:607: mahārāja utthāyasanebhya ekāṃsena cīvarāṇi prāvṛtya dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ
K12bsu035_u:612: sarvalokapālastutaḥ stavito varṇitaḥ praśaṃsitaḥ sarvadevabhavanāvabhāsitaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
K12bsu035_u:616: imamasya bhadanta bhagavan suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasya vistareṇa parṣadi saṃprakāśyamānasyāsmākaṃ catūrṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇām
K12bsu035_u:617: etena ca dharmaśravaṇena dharmāmṛtarasena ca divyātmabhāvamahātejasā vivardhayiṣyanti //
K12bsu035_u:618: asmākaṃ kāyeṣu vīryaṃ ca balaṃ sthāma ca saṃjanitaṃ bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:619: tejaśca śriyaṃ ca lakṣmīṃ cāsmākaṃ kāyeṣvāviśanti /
K12bsu035_u:620: vayaṃ bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājā dhārmikāśca dharmavādinaśca dharmarājā dharmeṇa vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍanaramahoragāṇāṃ rājatvaṃ kārayiṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:623: satatasamitaṃ sarve jambudvīpaṃ divyena viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa vyavalokayiṣyāma
K12bsu035_u:625: tena hetunā bhadanta bhagavannasmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ lokapāla iti saṃjñotpāditā //
K12bsu035_u:627: ye kecidbhadanta bhagavannasmin jambudvīpe viparyāsāḥ paracakreṇa copahatā bhaviṣyanti,
K12bsu035_u:629: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājā idamasya suvarṇaprabhāsoottamasūtrendrarājasya teṣāṃ ca sūtredradhāriṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃcodanāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ
K12bsu035_u:630: yadā ceme bhadanta bhagavan dharmabhāṇakā bhikṣavo 'smākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ saṃcodanayā
K12bsu035_u:631: buddhādhiṣṭhānena ca yeṣu viṣayeṣūpasaṃkrameyusteṣu te viṣayeṣuḥ cemaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājaṃ
K12bsu035_u:634: yasya ca bhadanta bhagavan manuṣyarājasya viṣaye te sūtrendradhārakā bhikṣavā dharmabhāṇākā upasaṃkrāntā bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:635: ayaṃ ca manuṣyarāja imaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsasūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇyāt /
K12bsu035_u:636: śrutvā ca teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sarvapratyarthikebhya ārakṣāṃ kuryāt paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ kuryāt /
K12bsu035_u:637: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājāstasya manuṣyarājasya sarvaviṣayagatānāṃ ca sattvānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:638: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavan sarvamanuṣyarājaḥ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sukhatāṃ kuryāt /
K12bsu035_u:639: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājāstaṃ manuṣyarājaṃ sarvarājebhyaḥ satkṛtataraṃ
K12bsu035_u:640: kariṣyāmo gurukṛtaṃ ca kariṣyāmo mānitaṃ ca pūjitaṃ ca sarvaviṣayeṣu ca prasaṃśanīyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:642: sādhu sādhu mahārājāḥ sādhu sādhu yuṣmākaṃ mahārājāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:644: dharmikāśca dharmavādinaśca dharmeṇa devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājatvaṃ kārayadhvam /

K12bsu035_u:660: suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājo 'nāgate 'dhvani yatra grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu pracariṣyati yasya yasya manuṣyarājasya viṣayamanuprāpto bhaviṣyati /

K12bsu035_u:665: sakalaparivārāṇāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣarākṣasaśatasahasrāṇāmimān divyātmabhāvān mahataujasā vivardhayet /
K12bsu035_u:666: mahāntaṃ vīryaṃ ca sthāma ca balaṃ cāsmākaṃ kāyeṣu tejaḥśriyaśca lakṣmī cāsmākaṃ vivardhayet /

K12bsu035_u:670: teṣāṃ ca manuṣyarājānāmasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotṝṇāṃ mātāpitṝṇāṃ cārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:671: paritrāṇaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ ca kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:672: teṣāṃ ca rājakulānāṃ teṣāṃ ca rāṣṭrāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca viṣayāṇāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:673: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:674: tāṃśca viṣayān sarvabhayopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocayiṣyāmaḥ paracakrāṇi ca pratinivartayiṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:675: yaḥ kaścit tasya manuṣyarājasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śroturmānayituḥ pūjayituranyaḥ sāmantakaḥ pratiśatrurājā bhavet /
K12bsu035_u:676: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya sāmantakasya pratiśatro rājña evaṃ cittamutpādet /

K12bsu035_u:678: tena khalu punarbhadanta bhagavān kālena tena samayenāsya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya
K12bsu035_u:679: sūtrendrarājasya tejo 'nubhāvena tasya sāmantakasya pratiśatrurājasyānyai rājabhiḥ
K12bsu035_u:685: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya sāmantakasya pratiśatrurājasya svaviṣayagatānyevaṃrūpāṇi nānopadravaśatāni nānāvyakṣepaśatāni bhaveyuḥ /

K12bsu035_u:687: yatrāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sutrendrarājo bhavet sa pratiśatrurājaḥ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyena taṃ viṣayamupasaṃkramitukāmo bhavet /
K12bsu035_u:689: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavañcatvāro mahārājāḥ sabalaparivārā anekairyakṣarākṣasaśatasahasrairadṛśyairātmabhāvaistatropasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ
K12bsu035_u:691: tathaiva pratinivartayiṣyāmo nānāvyākṣepaśatāni copasaṃhariṣyāmo vighnāṃśca kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:692: yathā ca tatparacakraṃ na śakṣyati tatra viṣaya upasaṃkramitum /
K12bsu035_u:694: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sādhukāramadāt /
K12bsu035_u:695: sādhu sādhu mahārājāḥ sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ mahārājānām /
K12bsu035_u:697: teṣāṃ manuṣyarājānāmasya ca suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotṝṇāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyatha /
K12bsu035_u:699: tāni ca rājakulāni tāni nagarāṇi tāni ca rāṣṭrāṇi tāni ca viṣayāṇyārakṣayiṣyatha /
K12bsu035_u:700: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyatha /
K12bsu035_u:704: yathā ca te yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmasmiñjambudvīpe teṣu caturṣu

K12bsu035_u:709: svena ca rājyaiśvaryeṇa ca tuṣṭā bhaveyuḥ /

K12bsu035_u:714: sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣvabhiramerantena puṇyena caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmayaṃ
K12bsu035_u:726: yatkaścinmahārājo bhaved ya itthamasya suvarṇaprabhāsattamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotā

K12bsu035_u:729: yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāmanukampārthāya satatasamitaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājendraṃ śṛṇvan /
K12bsu035_u:732: mahacca yuṣmākaṃ vīryaṃ ca sthāma balaṃ ca vapuṣaḥ saṃjanayet /
K12bsu035_u:734: tena ca manuṣyarājena mama śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyācintyā mahāvipulavistīrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /

K12bsu035_u:736: tena tasya manuṣyarājasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:737: tena ca tasya rājño rakṣāṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:738: agramahiṣyāśca rājaputrāṇāṃ ca sarvāntaḥpurasya ca rājakulasya ca sarvasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:739: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:740: rājakulanivāsanyaśca sarvadevatā ojovattarāśca cittena sukhasaumanasyena samanvāgatā bhavitāro ratimanubhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:741: tāni ca rāṣṭrāṇi tāni ca viṣayāṇi cārakṣitāni bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:744: evamukte vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo virūḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo mahārājaste sarve bhagavantametadavocan /
K12bsu035_u:745: tena ca bhagavanmanuṣyarājena susnātagātreṇa bhavitavyaṃ sugandhavāsanadhāriṇā navaruciravastraprāvṛtena nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitena bhavitavyam
K12bsu035_u:751: tena manuṣyarājena tasminkāle tasmitsamaye 'gramahiṣī rājaputrāśca rājaduhitaraśca sarvāntaḥpuragaṇāśca (Bagchi 42)
K12bsu035_u:762: tasmiṃśca khalu pugarmahārajāḥ kāle tasminsamaye tena manuṣyarājena sarvaśvetāni pāṇḍurāṇi navarucivastrāṇi prāvaritavyāni /
K12bsu035_u:764: mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā rājavyūhena nānāvicitraratnamaṅgalaparigṛhītaistato rājakulādabhiniṣkramitavyam /
K12bsu035_u:765: tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ pratyudgamanāya gantavyam /
K12bsu035_u:767: yāvanti manuṣyarājastatra padāni bhāvayati tāvanti kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃsārātparāṅmukhāni kariṣyati tāvatāṃ cakravartirājakulakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:768: yāvanti sa tatra padānyatikramiṣyati tāvatāṃ caiva dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇācintyena mahatā rājyaiśvaryeṇa vivardhiṣyate /
K12bsu035_u:770: anekeṣāṃ ca divyodārāṇāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāṃ rājakulaputraśatasahasrāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /

K12bsu035_u:777: mahābalaśca mahānagnabalavegadhārī cābhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataśca bhaviṣyati /

K12bsu035_u:800: yadā ca mahārājāḥ sa manuṣyarājo 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa saddharmagauraveṇa suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājadhārakā
K12bsu035_u:802: sabalaparivārāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca devagaṇānāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāṃ mahā tathā

K12bsu035_u:804: ca tenaiva cātmabhāvena ca dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇācintyena mahatā rājyaiśvaryeṇa vivardhayiṣyati /

K12bsu035_u:815: samantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya bhikṣordhamāsanagatasya tena manuṣyarājenāsmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmarthāya nānāgandhā dhūpayitavyāḥ
K12bsu035_u:816: sahadhūpiteṣu bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya pūjārthāya nānāgandheṣu nānāgandhadhūpalatā niścaranti /

K12bsu035_u:896: brahmā ca sahāṃpatiḥ śakraśca devānāmindraḥ sarasvatī ca mahādevī śrīśca mahādevī

K12bsu035_u:1279: atra dharmāsanagato 'smyadṛśyamānenātmabhāvenottamāṅgena ca tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ pādatalau pratisaṃhariṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1283: pṛthivīskandhamātmānaṃ cānena dharmaśravaṇena dharmāmṛtarasena yāvadvajramayaṃ pṛthivītalamupādāya
K12bsu035_u:1285: uparitaścemaṃ samudraparyantaṃ pṛthivītalamupādāya pṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ snigdhena pṛthivīrasena snehayiṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1289: gandhatarāṇi snigdhatarāṇyāsvadanīyāni darśanīyatarāṇi mahottarāṇi ca bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1290: te ca sattvāstāni pānabhojanāni nānāvidhānyupabhuktvā āyurbalavarṇendriyāṇi vivardhayiṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1291: tejobalavarṇarūpasamanvāuatāśca bhūtvā nānāvidhāni pṛthivīgatānyanekāni nānākāryaśatasahasrāṇi kariṣyantyutthāsyanti vyāpayiṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1293: tena hetunā bhadanta bhagavansarvajambudvīpaḥ kṣemaśca bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:1298: asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasyārthāya teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānaṃ dharmāsanagatānāmantikamupasaṃkrameyuḥ
K12bsu035_u:1299: upasaṃkramitvā tāni prasannacittāni sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya tāndharmabhāṇakānadhyeṣayeyusya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya prakāśataḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1300: ahaṃ dṛḍhā pṛthivīdevatā saparivāraujasvitarā ca bhaviṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1301: tena bhadanta bhagavaṃścāsmākaṃ kāye mahābalavī ryasthāmasaṃjanitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:1303: mayi ca bhadanta bhagavandṛḍhāyāṃ pṛthivīdevatāyāmanena dharmāmṛtarasena saṃtarpitāyāṃ
K12bsu035_u:1307: imāni ca bhadanta bhagana sarvasattvāni pṛthivīsaṃniśritāni vṛddhivirūḍhivaipulyatāṃ ca gamiṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1309: mahanti ca bhūtvā sarvasattvāni pṛthivīgatāni nānopabhogaparibhogānyupabhokṣyanti sukhāni cānubhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1313: tena bhadanta bhagavanhetunā sarvasattvairasmākaṃ kṛtajñatā kartavyā /
K12bsu035_u:1314: avaśyamayaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājaḥ satkṛtya śrotavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1315: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃste sarve sattvā nānākulebhyo nānāgṛhebhyo niṣkrameyusteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmupasakramaṇāya /
K12bsu035_u:1317: śrutvā ca punareva te sattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu nānākuleṣu gṛhagrāmanagaranigameṣu praviṣṭāḥ svagṛhagatāṃ paraspareṇaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1324: tena ca nānāgṛhagatā bhūtvā teṣāṃ sattvānāmitaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādantaśa
K12bsu035_u:1327: suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya nāmadheyamapi pareṣāṃ sattvānā saṃśrāvayeyuḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1328: yatra yatra bhadanta bhagavaṃstāni nānāvidhāni sattvāni nānāvidheṣu pṛthivīpradeśaṣvimānyevaṃrūpāṇi nānāvidhāni sūtrāntahetūni paraspareṇārocayeyuḥ saṃśrāvayeyuśca /
K12bsu035_u:1330: sarve te bhadanta bhagavanpṛthivīpradeśā ojasvitarāśca bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1332: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ teṣu teṣu pṛthivīpradeśeṣu nānāvidhāni pṛthivīrasāni sarvopakaraṇāni bhūyiṣṭhataramutpatsyante vivardhayiṣyante vaipulyatāṃ gamiṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1333: sarvāṇi tāni sattvāni mahādhanāni mahābhogāni ca dānādhimuktāni ca bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu035_u:1336: ye kecitpṛthivīdevate sattvā itaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādantaśa ekapadamapi
K12bsu035_u:1337: śṛṇuyuste ta ito manuṣyalokāccavitvā trayastriṃśatsu devanikāyeṣvanyatarānyatareṣu
K12bsu035_u:1339: ye kecitpṛthivī devate sattvā asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājāsyārthāya tāni sthānāni samalaṃkurvīrannantaśa ekacchatraṃ vā ekadūṣyaṃ vā samalaṃkṛtāni ca devatāsthānāni /
K12bsu035_u:1340: teṣu saptasu kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu saptaratnamayāni divyāni vimānāni sarvālaṃkārasamalaṃkṛtāni
K12bsu035_u:1341: saṃsthāsyanti te sattvā ito manuṣyalokāccyāvitvā teṣu saptaratnamayeṣu divyavimāneṣūpapatsyante /
K12bsu035_u:1342: te caikaikasminpṛthivīdevate saptaratnamaye divyavimāne saptavarā anupapatsyante acintyāni divyāni sukhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti //
K12bsu035_u:1344: tenāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavandṛḍhā pṛthivīdevatā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣordharmāsanagatasya teṣu pṛthivīpradeśeṣvavāsiṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1347: yathāpyayaṃ suvarṇaprabhasottamaḥ sūtrendrarājasteṣāṃ buddhasahasrāvaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ciraṃ jambudvīpe pracaret /
K12bsu035_u:1358: cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
K12bsu035_u:1360: ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavansuvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarāja etarhi cānagate 'dhvani
K12bsu035_u:1361: yatra grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vā janapadapradeśe vāraṇyāyatane vā girikandare
K12bsu035_u:1362: vā rājakule vā gṛhe vā pracariṣyati /
K12bsu035_u:1363: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavansaṃjñeyo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭāviṃśati bhirmahāyakṣasenāpatibhistatra
K12bsu035_u:1364: grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vāraṇye vā girikandare vā rājakule vopasaṃkramiṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1365: adṛśyamānenātmabhāvena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣo rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1366: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ śāntisvaratyayanaṃ kariṣyami /
K12bsu035_u:1367: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ yeṣāṃ keṣāṃciditaḥ
K12bsu035_u:1368: suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādantaśa ekā catuṣpādikāpi gāthā śrutā bhavedantaśa
K12bsu035_u:1371: nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhavedudgṛhītaṃ vā teṣāṃ sarveṣāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1372: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ ca kariṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1373: teṣāṃ ca kulānāṃ teṣāṃ ca gṛhāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca nagarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca nigamānāṃ teṣāṃ cāraṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ ca rājakulānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi
K12bsu035_u:1374: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmi //
K12bsu035_u:1386: acintyo me bhadanta bhagavansarvadharmeṣu jñānaviṣayaḥ pravartate /
K12bsu035_u:1387: yathā ca me bhadanta bhagavansarvadharmāḥ samamyagjñātāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1390: tena hetunā mama bhadanta bhagavansaṃjñeyasya mahāyakṣasenāpateḥ saṃjñeya iti nāmadheyaṃ samudapādi //
K12bsu035_u:1393: mahāntaṃ ca tasya sthāma ca balaṃ vīryaṃ ca kāye saṃjanayiṣyāmi /
K12bsu035_u:1397: yathā ca sa dharmabhāṇako na klāntakāyo bhavet /
K12bsu035_u:1400: yenāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājasteṣāṃ buddhasahasrāvaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ciraṃ jambudvīpe pracaret /
K12bsu035_u:1409: iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarāje saṃjñeyamahāyakṣasenāpati parivarto nāma dvādaśaḥ //
K12bsu035_u:1416: tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena rājā baladaketuḥ putrasya ruciraketoracirābhiṣiktasya ca rājyapratiṣṭhitasyaitadavocat /
K12bsu035_u:1418: yanmayā pūrvamacirābhiṣiktena ca rājyapratiṣṭhitena pitū rājño balendraketoḥ sakāśādudgṛhītam /
K12bsu035_u:1419: tena mayā devendrasamayena rājaśāstreṇa viṃśativarṣasahasrāṇi rājatvaṃ kāritaṃ babhūva /
K12bsu035_u:1422: atha khalu kuladevate rājā baladaketustena kālena tena samayena putrasya rājño ruciraketorimābhirgāthābhirdevendrasamayaṃ nāma rājaśāstraṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma //
K12bsu035_u:1430: chettā tvaṃ saṃśayānāṃ ca cchindayāsmākaṃ saṃśayam // Suv_13.4 //
K12bsu035_u:1432: kathaṃ manuṣyasaṃbhūto rājā devaḥ sa procyate /
K12bsu035_u:1433: yadiha mānuṣe loke jāyate ca bhavannṛpaḥ // Suv_13.5 //
K12bsu035_u:1440: hetunā yena rājāno bhavanti viṣayeṣu ca // Suv_13.8 //
K12bsu035_u:1442: pūrvamadhiṣṭhito devaiḥ paścād garbhe prapadyate // Suv_13.9 //
K12bsu035_u:1443: kiṃ cāpi mānuṣe loke jāyate śrīyate nṛpaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1444: api vai devasaṃbhūto devaputraḥ sa ucyate // Suv_13.10 //
K12bsu035_u:1446: putrastvaṃ saha devānāṃ nirmito manujeśvaraḥ // Suv_13.11 //
K12bsu035_u:1449: manuṣyo vātha devo vā gandharvo vā narādhipaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1450: rākṣaso vātha caṇḍālo duṣkṛtānāṃ nivārakaḥ // Suv_13.13 //
K12bsu035_u:1451: mātā pitā vā nṛpatiḥ sukṛtau karmakāriṇām /
K12bsu035_u:1455: yadā hyupekṣate rājā duṣkṛtaṃ viṣaye sthitam /
K12bsu035_u:1456: nānārūpaṃ na kurvīta daṇḍaṃ pāpajanasya ca /
K12bsu035_u:1459: śāṭhyāni kalahāścaiva bhūyo rāṣṭre bhavanti ca /
K12bsu035_u:1461: yadā hyupekṣate rājā duṣkṛtaṃ viṣaye sthiram /
K12bsu035_u:1462: hanyate viṣayo ghoraiḥ śaṭhyairapi sudāruṇaiḥ // Suv_13.18 //
K12bsu035_u:1464: bhogāni ca balānyeva dhanaṃ yasyāsti saṃcitam // Suv_13.19 //
K12bsu035_u:1465: vividhāni ca śāṭhyāni haranti ca parasparam /
K12bsu035_u:1467: vilopayati svaṃ rāṣṭraṃ gajendra iva padminīm // Suv_13.20 //
K12bsu035_u:1470: sasyaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ bījaṃ va samyakparipacyate /
K12bsu035_u:1471: durbhikṣaṃ bhavate tatra yatra rājā hyupekṣakaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1472: anāttamānaso devā bhavanti bhavaneṣu ca // Suv_13.22 //
K12bsu035_u:1474: te sarve devarājāśca vakṣyanti ca parasparam // Suv_13.23 //
K12bsu035_u:1476: na cireṇa hyayaṃ rājā devatāṃ kopayiṣyati // Suv_13.24 //
K12bsu035_u:1478: śasrāṇi ca adharmaśca viṣaye 'tra bhaviṣyanti // Suv_13.25 //
K12bsu035_u:1479: śāṭhyānāṃ kalahānāṃ ca rogāṇāṃ ca samudbhavaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1480: prakupyati ca devendra upekṣyanti ca devatāḥ // Suv_13.26 //
K12bsu035_u:1481: pralupyate ca yadrāṣṭraṃ sa nṛpaḥ śokamṛcchati /
K12bsu035_u:1482: iṣṭaviyogaṃ prāpnoti bhrātrā vātha sutena vā // Suv_13.27 //
K12bsu035_u:1489: parasparaṃ hariṣyanti kulabhogaṃ dhanāni ca // Suv_13.30 //
K12bsu035_u:1490: deśe deśe haniṣyanti śastreṇa ca parasparam /
K12bsu035_u:1491: vivādāḥ kalahāḥ śāṭhyā bhavanti viṣayeṣu ca // Suv_13.31 //
K12bsu035_u:1496: dhārmikānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ nigraho bhavati dhruvam /
K12bsu035_u:1504: glānena bahulāḥ sattvā bhavanti viṣayeṣu ca /
K12bsu035_u:1505: madhurāṇi mahānti ca phalāni viṣaye 'pi hi /
K12bsu035_u:1506: parītā ca bhaviṣyanti tiktaḥ kaṭuka eva ca // Suv_13.37 //
K12bsu035_u:1510: dhānyānāṃ ca phalānāṃ ca snigghabhāvo rasaḥ kṣayet /
K12bsu035_u:1513: bahu ca bhojanaṃ bhuktvā tṛptiṃ nāsādayanti te // Suv_13.40 //
K12bsu035_u:1514: balaṃ ca sthāma vīryaṃ ca na labhanti tadantare /
K12bsu035_u:1515: hīnavīryāṇi sattvāni bhavanti viṣayeṣu ca // Suv_13.41 //
K12bsu035_u:1520: aneke īdṛśā doṣā bhavanti viṣayeṣu ca // Suv_13.43 //
K12bsu035_u:1523: na tatkaroti rājatvaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ samupekṣataḥ // Suv_13.44 //
K12bsu035_u:1527: yadā hyupakṣate rājā duṣkṛtaṃ viṣaye sthitam /
K12bsu035_u:1529: na tadbhavati putratvaṃ na rajatvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // Suv_13.46 //
K12bsu035_u:1540: tyajecca jīvitaṃ rājyaṃ dharmārthaṃ viṣayasya ca /
K12bsu035_u:1545: vilupyate ca tadrāṣṭraṃ gajairiva mahāsaraḥ // Suv_13.53 //
K12bsu035_u:1547: viṣamāḥ sarvabhāvāśca bhavanti viṣayasya hi // Suv_13.54 //
K12bsu035_u:1549: dharmeṇa pālayedrāṣṭaṃ mā cādharmaṃ samācaret // Suv_13.55 //
K12bsu035_u:1550: jīvitaṃ ca parityajya mā pāpe patito bhavet /
K12bsu035_u:1552: ekāpekṣo bhavedrājā mā pakṣe patito bhavet // Suv_13.56 //
K12bsu035_u:1556: dharmeṇa śāsyate rāṣṭraṃ sukṛte sthāpyate janam // Suv_13.58 //
K12bsu035_u:1558: sukṛtena ca rājā taṃ iha preṣayate janam /
K12bsu035_u:1559: devairdevasutaiḥ pūrṇaṃ karoti ca surālayam // Suv_13.59 //
K12bsu035_u:1560: dharmeṇa śāsyate rāṣṭraṃ rājā naḥ supraharṣitāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1561: prasannā bhonti devendrā rakṣante tānnarādhipān // Suv_13.60 //
K12bsu035_u:1563: kālena vāyavo vānti kāle caivaṃ pravarṣati // Suv_13.61 //
K12bsu035_u:1567: āvartayeddharmaratnaṃ yena lokaḥ sukhī bhavet // Suv_13.63 //
K12bsu035_u:1568: / dhārmikīṃ ca nayet sevāṃ yo guṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1569: sa nityaṃ sevate tuṣṭaṃ sadā pāpavivarjitaḥ // Suv_13.64 //
K12bsu035_u:1571: sukṛte sthāpayet sattvānduṣkṛte ca vivārayet // Suv_13.65 //
K12bsu035_u:1572: subhikṣaṃ bhavate rāṣṭre tejasvī bhavate nṛpaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1574: yaśasvī bhavate rājā sukhaṃ pālayate prajāmiti // Suv_13.66 //
K12bsu035_u:1578: sasāgarā tyakta vasuṃdharā tadā yadā babhūva nṛpa cakravartī /
K12bsu035_u:1579: catvāri dvīpāni saratnapūrṇaniryāti tā pūrvajineṣu mahyam // Suv_14.1 //
K12bsu035_u:1580: na cāsti tadvastu priyaṃ manāpaṃ pūrvaṃ ca mahyaṃ na va tyaktamāsīt /
K12bsu035_u:1581: taṃ dharmakāyaṃ parimārgaṇārthaḥ priyajīvitaṃ tyaktamanekakalpān // Suv_14.2 //
K12bsu035_u:1582: yatha pūrvakalpeṣu acintiyeṣu ratnaśikhisya sugatasya śāsane /
K12bsu035_u:1583: parinirvṛtasya sugatasya tasya susaṃbhavo nāma babhūva rājā // Suv_14.3 //
K12bsu035_u:1584: sa cakravartī caturdvīpa īśvaraḥ samudraparyantamahī praśāsyate /
K12bsu035_u:1585: jinendraghoṣāya ca rājadhānīya supto babhūvā tada rājakuñjaraḥ // Suv_14.4 //
K12bsu035_u:1586: svapnāntare buddhaguṇāñca śrutvā ratnoccayaṃ paśyati dharmabhāṇakam /
K12bsu035_u:1587: sthita sūryamadhye va virocamānaṃ prakāśayantaṃ ima sūtrarājam // Suv_14.5 //
K12bsu035_u:1589: abhiniṣkrarma rājakulāni dṛṣṭu upasaṃkramī śrāvakasaṃghamagram // Suv_14.6 //
K12bsu035_u:1590: karoti pūjāṃ jinaśrāvakāṇāṃ ratnoccayaṃ pṛcchati dharmabhāṇakam /
K12bsu035_u:1592: kva cāsti bhikṣūriha cāryasaṃghe ratnoccayo nāma guṇānvitaśca // Suv_14.7 //
K12bsu035_u:1593: tenāntareṇā ratanoccayo hi anyatra gūhāntara saṃniṣaṇaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:1594: vicitraratnaṃ ima sūtrarājaṃ svadhyāyamānaḥ sukha saṃniṣaṇaḥ // Suv_14.8 //
K12bsu035_u:1595: deśenti rājasya tadantareṇa ratnoccayaṃ bhikṣu sa dharmabhāṇakam /
K12bsu035_u:1598: eṣo 'tra ratnoccaya dharmabhāṇako dhāreti gambhīrajinasya gocaram /
K12bsu035_u:1600: vanditva pādau ratanoccayasya susaṃbhavo rāja idaṃ pravīddhi /
K12bsu035_u:1601: deśe hi me pūrṇaśaśāṅka cakraṃ svarṇaprabhāsottamasūtraratnam // Suv_14.11 //
K12bsu035_u:1602: adhivāsayī so ratanoccayaśca rājñaśca tasyaiva susaṃbhavasya /

K12bsu035_u:2252: svadeha śataśa iha kṛtva muditamanāḥ parajīvaśarīre // Suv_19.5 //
K12bsu035_u:2253: atha te rājakumārāḥ paramasaṃdīptā eṣā vyāghrīti drutamanimiṣimanunirīkṣantaḥ pracaṅkramustato mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt /
K12bsu035_u:2257: śtanayakṛtadharmābhaidanāntairanantaṃ na vijahati anupūrvaṃ svasvabhāvaṃ kṛtaghnuḥ // Suv_19.6 //
K12bsu035_u:2259: nāstī tasyopajīvyaṃ sarvatu madhye bhutatvāttaṃ niyojya /
K12bsu035_u:2263: niḥsāraphenakalpaṃ kṛmiśatabharitaṃ kāryakṛtyaṃ tanu hi // Suv_19.8 //
K12bsu035_u:2265: saṃpūrṇaṃ dharmakāya guṇaśatabharitaṃ prāpsyeva suśuddham // Suv_19.9 //
K12bsu035_u:2266: sa khalvevaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ paramakaruṇoparigatahṛdayaḥ tayorvikṣepaṃ cakāra /
K12bsu035_u:2268: atha sa mahāsattvo rājakumāraḥ tasmādupavanātpratinivṛtya vyāghryā ālayamupagamya vanalatāyāṃ prāvaraṇamṛtsṛjya praṇidhānaṃ cakāra /
K12bsu035_u:2269: eṣo 'haṃ jagato hitārthamanuttarāṃ bodhiṃ vibudhya śivāṃ kāruṇyātpradadāmi niścalamatirdehaṃ parairdustyajam /
K12bsu035_u:2270: tanme bodhiranāmayā yā jinasutairabhyarcitā nirjvalā trailikyaṃ bhavasāgarātpratibhayāduttārayeyānmām /
K12bsu035_u:2272: tato vyāghrī maitrīvato bodhisattvasya na kiñciccakre /
K12bsu035_u:2273: tato bodhisattvo durbalāvarto 'yamathetyutthāya śastraṃ paryeṣate sma /
K12bsu035_u:2277: prapatitamātre ca bodhisattve bhūmiriyaṃ pracaravihīneva nauḥ salilamadhye gatā ṣaḍvikāraṃ pracacāla /
K12bsu035_u:2280: athānyatarā vismayā varjitamanasā devatā bodhisattvaṃ tuṣṭāva //
K12bsu035_u:2281: yathā kāruṇyaṃ te visṛtamiha sattveṣu sumate
K12bsu035_u:2282: yathā vai taddehaṃ tyajasi naravīra pramuditaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2284: nirāyāsaṃ śāntaṃ tvamiha na cirātprāpsyasi śubham // Suv_19.10 //
K12bsu035_u:2285: atha khalu sā vyāghrī rudhiramrakṣitaśarīraṃ bodhisattvamavekṣya muhūrtamātreṇa nirmāṃsarudhiramasthyavaśeṣaṃ cakāra //
K12bsu035_u:2287: pracalita sasamudrā sāgarā vasumatidaśadikṣū suptaraśmiśca sūryaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2288: patati kusumavarṣaṃ vyākulaṃ vā mano me svatanuriha visṛṣṭaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhrātṛṇā me // Suv_19.11//
K12bsu035_u:2290: yathā ca so karuṇavaco hyavocata samīkṣya tāṃ svatanāyabhakṣaṇodyatāṃ /
K12bsu035_u:2291: kṣudhānvitāṃ vyaśanaśataiḥ samanvitāṃ sudurbalā matiriha saṃśayā tu me // Suv_19.12 //
K12bsu035_u:2292: atha tau rājakumārau paramaśokābhibhūtau vāṣpapariplutākṣau tamenaṃ panthānaṃ pratinivṛtya gacchantau vyāghrīsamīpamevābhijagmatuḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2293: taṃ dadṛśtuḥ śataṃ vaṃśalatāsamāyuktaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇavikṛṣṇāni (Bagchi 111)
K12bsu035_u:2295: nānādigvidikṣu keśānvistīrṇāndṛṣṭvā ca samūrcchannau bhūmau nipetatuḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2297: aho priyabhrātṛka pārthivāyaṃ tathā jananī sutavatsalā yā
K12bsu035_u:2298: pṛcchiṣyate sā jananī tṛtīyaḥ kva vā yuvābhyāṃ kamalāyatekṣṇaḥ // Suv_19.13 //
K12bsu035_u:2299: aho hi asmākamihaiva śobhitaṃ nanū pradeśe maraṇaṃ na jīvitam /
K12bsu035_u:2300: kathaṃ mahāsattvavivarjitā vayaṃ dāsyāmahe darśanamambatātayoḥ // Suv_19.14 //
K12bsu035_u:2301: atha tau rājakumārau bahuvividhakaruṇaṃ vilāpya pracakramatuḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2302: tatra kumārasyopasthāyakā diśi vidiśi pradhāvantaḥ kumārānveṣaṇāḥ parasparaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca papracchuḥ kva kumāraḥ kva kumāra iti /
K12bsu035_u:2303: tasmiṃśca samaye devī śayanatalagatā priyaviprayogasūcakaṃ svapnaṃ dadarśa /
K12bsu035_u:2304: tadyathā stanau chidyamānau dantotpātanaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ trayaḥ kapotaśāvakāḥ pratilambhamānāste bhītā eva śyenenācchidyamānāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2305: atha devī bhūmikāmpādutrastahṛdayā sahasā prativibudhya cintāparā babhūva //
K12bsu035_u:2306: kimeṣā bhūtadhātrī jalanidhivasanā kampati bhṛśaṃ sūryaḥ śūlī na raśmirmama ca kica bhūbhajaṃ vayati vā /
K12bsu035_u:2307: duḥkhaṃ kurvati me gātraṃ calati ca nayanaṃ svastanaṃ chidyatī ca /
K12bsu035_u:2308: svasti me syātsutānāṃ vanavivaramidaṃ krīḍanārthaṃ gatānām // Suv_19.15 //
K12bsu035_u:2309: athaivaṃ cintayantyāśceṭī ca saṃtrastahṛdayā praviśya devyā nivedayāmāsa /
K12bsu035_u:2318: tatra pravṛtte kumārānveṣaṇābhidrute janakāya athācirādeva rājā dadarśa dūrata evāgacchantau rājakumārau /
K12bsu035_u:2322: na bhavati nirupalambhe na prītirevaṃ narāṇāṃ bhavati sutaviyogādyādṛśaṃ daurmanasyam /
K12bsu035_u:2323: nanu varasukhinaste yena puṃsābhiyogā maraṇamupagatā vā ye na jīvanti putrāḥ // Suv_19.16 //
K12bsu035_u:2324: atha devī paramaśokābhibhūtā marmahanteva kalabhī ārtasvaramuvāca //
K12bsu035_u:2325: yadi tanayāstrayasya bhṛtyavargā vanavare kusumākule praviṣṭāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2326: kva sa hṛdayasamo samastṛtīyaḥ sutamanayāpadavaiti kanīyasametat // Suv_19.17 //
K12bsu035_u:2327: tayorāgatayo rājā putrāvetatparyapṛcchatotsukaḥ kumārau paripṛcchati sma /
K12bsu035_u:2329: tataḥ śokārtāvaśrudrutanayanau pariśuṣkatālvoṣṭhadaśanavadanau na kiñcidūcatuḥ // devyuvāca //
K12bsu035_u:2330: kathayatāṃ laghu vimuhyati smṛtiśca paramabhṛśaṃ paripīḍyate ca dehaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2331: kva sa mama putrastṛtīya hṛdayaṃ idaṃ sphuṭitaṃ tu saṃmūrcchati vā // Suv_19.18 //
K12bsu035_u:2332: atha tau kumārau vistareṇa taṃ vṛttāntaṃ nivedayāmāsa /
K12bsu035_u:2335: atha rājā devī ca taṇyasthīnyapagatarudhiramāṃsāni vāyunā diśo vidiśaśca keśavikīrṇā dṛṣṭvā (Bagchi 113)
K12bsu035_u:2337: tataḥ purohitaḥ suciraṃ tāmavasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā salilamalayacandanapaṅkai rājño devyāśca śarīraṃ prahlādayāmāsa /
K12bsu035_u:2339: hā kaṣṭaṃ putra kva manorasa darśanīya mṛtyorvaśaṃ śīghramupagatāsi /
K12bsu035_u:2340: mṛtyoḥ praśmameva hi cāgato vinā te paraṃ mama bhaviṣyati duḥkhamanyat // Suv_19.19 //
K12bsu035_u:2341: devī ca mohātyāgatā prakīrṇakeśī bāhubhyāmurastāḍayantī sthānyāṃ pluta iva matsyā dharaṇyāstale parivartamānā mahiṣīva naṣṭavatsā kalabhīva naṣṭaśāvakā karuṇakaruṇaṃ roditi //
K12bsu035_u:2342: hā kānta priyasuta kena vrajase bhagno 'yaṃ padmo dharaṇītale hi vikīrṇaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2343: śatruṇā mama bhuvi kena nāśaṃ gato 'dya putro me nayanamanoharacandraḥ
K12bsu035_u:2344: hā kiṃ śarīramiha adya na yāti bhagnaṃ paśyāmi haṃ sutavaraṃ nihataṃ pṛthivyām // Suv_19.20 //
K12bsu035_u:2345: saṃvyaktaṃ hṛdayamayo mamaitaṃ dhigvyasanaṃ avekṣya no cedbhedayate /
K12bsu035_u:2347: svapnāntare dvau stanau daṃṣṭrotpāṭya me priyasuto nāśaṃ gataḥ śīghramataḥ // Suv_19.21 //
K12bsu035_u:2348: sa śyenenāpahṛto yathaiva iha me labdhaiḥ kapotaistribhiḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2349: so me 'dya tribhirātmajaiḥ parivṛta eko hato mṛtyunā // Suv_19.22 //
K12bsu035_u:2351: atha rājā devī ca bahuvidhaṃ karuṇakaruṇaṃ paridevatastayoḥ sarvabharaṇānyavamucya
K12bsu035_u:2352: mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ putrasya śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā tasminpṛthivīpradeśe suvarṇamayacaityeṣu
K12bsu035_u:2354: syātte khalu punarānandānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsattvo nāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
K12bsu035_u:2357: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsattvo nāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
K12bsu035_u:2358: tadāpi mayānanda rājadveṣamohāparimuktena narakādibhyaśca duḥkhebhyaḥ kṛpayā jagadanugṛhītam /
K12bsu035_u:2360: evaṃ hyekaikasya sattvasyārthe kalpaṃ samudeyaṃ narakeṣu jātiṃ saṃsārādvimocayeyam /
K12bsu035_u:2363: bahūni kalpāni mayātmā tyaktaḥ paryeṣayetā imamagrabodhim /
K12bsu035_u:2364: yathāsi rājā yatha rājaputram tathaiva tyaktā maya ātmabhāvāḥ // Suv_19.23 //
K12bsu035_u:2365: anusmarami purimāsu jātiṣu mahāratho nāma babhūva rājā /
K12bsu035_u:2366: tasyāpi putrau mahātyāgavanto nāmnā mahāsattva varo babhūva // Suv_19.24 //
K12bsu035_u:2367: dvau tasya āsīdatha bhrātarau ca nāmnā mahādeva mahāpraṇādaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2368: vanakhaṇḍa gatvā va samānagotraistairdṛṣṭa vyāghrī kṣudhayābhibhūtā // Suv_19.25 //
K12bsu035_u:2369: tasyāgrasattvasya kṛpābhijātā yannūna haṃ ātma tyajeya māṃsam /
K12bsu035_u:2371: eṣā hi vyāghrī kṣudhatarṣapīḍitā khādīya etāni svakātmajāni // Suv_19.26 //
K12bsu035_u:2373: dṛṣṭvā ca vyāghrīṃ kṣudhārtāṃ vyāghrasutamokṣārtham // Suv_19.27 //
K12bsu035_u:2374: karuṇāmaye patite 'tra kampita saśaila dharaṇī vidruta pakṣisaṃgha vividhāni /
K12bsu035_u:2376: dvau tasya bhrātarau ca mahāpraṇādastathā mahādevaḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2377: na labhete mahāsattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mahāvanakhaṇḍe 'smin // Suv_19.29 //
K12bsu035_u:2381: tatropasaṃkramitva yatra vyāghrī sudurbalā śayitā vyāghrīsutā // Suv_19.31 //
K12bsu035_u:2383: avakīrṇa patitāni yatkiñcinmātraṃ tasya patitaṃ dharaṇīyaṃ paśyanti // Suv_19.32 //
K12bsu035_u:2385: ubhau tau nṛpasutau saṃmūrcchitau hi tatra patanti dharaṇīyam /
K12bsu035_u:2396: śṛṇu mama nṛpate narendra śokāgninā mama dahyate śarīram /
K12bsu035_u:2398: sūcībhirivāṅgamaṅgaṃ pīḍyanti sma tāni mama hṛdayaṃ ca /
K12bsu035_u:2400: yathā nimittaṃ yādṛśa na bhūya paśyāmi darśanaṃ priyasutāna // Suv_19.39 //
K12bsu035_u:2401: putrāṇāṃ me vijāna dadāhi mama jīvitaṃ kṣemaṃ kuruṣva /
K12bsu035_u:2402: svapno mayā dṛṣṭastrayo mama kapotasutāni yo 'sya tṛtīyamahaṃ kapotasutaṃ priyamanā // Suv_19.40 //
K12bsu035_u:2403: śyenastatra praviṣṭaḥ śyenenāpahṛtaṃ kapotakaṃ ca svapnāntare ca /
K12bsu035_u:2404: mama īdṛśa śokaṃ praviṣṭiṃ hṛdaye 'smin // Suv_19.41 //
K12bsu035_u:2405: atidāhaśokacintā maraṇaṃ mama bhaviṣyati na cireṇa /
K12bsu035_u:2406: putrāṇa me vijāna dadasva mama jīvitaṃ bhavānsvakāruṇyam // Suv_19.42 //
K12bsu035_u:2410: dṛṣṭvā tāmagramahiṣīṃ saṃmūrcchitapatitāṃ ca tatra dharaṇīye /
K12bsu035_u:2412: amātyāśca prayuktā jijñāsārthaṃ gatāḥ kumārāṇām // Suv_19.44 //
K12bsu035_u:2415: tathā āgatāścāśrumukhā rodamānāḥ pṛcchinti patheṣu taṃ mahāsattvam // Suv_19.45 //
K12bsu035_u:2416: kiṃ jīvito vāṃ kva gataḥ sāṃprataṃ mahāsattvaḥ kiṃ drakṣyāmyahamadya /
K12bsu035_u:2417: manāpaṃ sattvadarśana priyamanāpaṃ na cireṇa vinaṣṭaśramam // Suv_19.46 //
K12bsu035_u:2419: anantāyāsasaṃkaṭāni ghoṣaḥ rājā mahārathotthāya rodamānaḥ // Suv_19.47 //
K12bsu035_u:2420: śokārttaḥ siñcati saliladhāraiḥ agramahiṣīṃ ca dharaṇīye patantīṃ /
K12bsu035_u:2421: siñcati udakena yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate utthāya pṛcchiraṃ dīnamānasā // Suv_19.48 //
K12bsu035_u:2422: kiṃ mama putrā hi mṛtā jīvanti rājā mahārathaścāgramahiṣīṃ ca /
K12bsu035_u:2423: evamevāvoca diśi vidiśāsu amātyā pārṣadyā jijñāsārthaṃ gatāḥ // Suv_19.49 //
K12bsu035_u:2424: kumārāṇāṃ mā tvamatidīnamānasā bhavā hīnāyāsa śokahṛdayā /
K12bsu035_u:2425: evaṃ mahārathaśca kṣamāpayitvā tadāgramahiṣīṃ ca kampo niṣkrame // Suv_19.50 //
K12bsu035_u:2427: sudīnamanasātha dīnacakṣuśca niṣkramya nagarapurato jijñāsārthāya // Suv_19.51 //
K12bsu035_u:2429: rājā putrāṇāṃ bahuprāṇinaḥ aśrumukho rodamāno dhāvati /
K12bsu035_u:2430: nirgataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubuddho 'tha samanantaraniṣkrāntaḥ // Suv_19.52 //
K12bsu035_u:2432: diśatāṃ sugaulanayano dṛṣṭvānyataraṃ puruṣaṃ muṇḍitaśīrṣaṃ ca // Suv_19.53 //
K12bsu035_u:2436: śīghrabhārādupasaṃkramya nṛpate rājño mahārathasya āvaciṃsu // Suv_19.55 //
K12bsu035_u:2437: mā śokacittastvaṃ bhava nṛpate tiṣṭhanti te putrāḥ priyamanāpāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2438: na cireṇāgamya iha tavāntike drakṣyasi tvaṃ putravaraṃ manāpam // Suv_19.56 //
K12bsu035_u:2441: dvai ca te putrai mahānṛpendra tiṣṭhataḥ śokānalasaṃpradīptau /
K12bsu035_u:2442: ekastavo putravaro na dṛśyeta nṛpa grasto mahāsattva anityatayā // Suv_19.58 //
K12bsu035_u:2445: teṣāṃ mahāsattva varakumāro mahānta kāruṇya balaṃ janetvā // Suv_19.59 //
K12bsu035_u:2446: bodhau ca kṛtvā praṇidhimudārāṃ sarvāṃśca sattvāniha bodhayiṣye /
K12bsu035_u:2447: taṃ bodhiṃ gambhīramudāramiṣṭvā anāgate 'dhvani ahaṃ spṛśeyam // Suv_19.60 //
K12bsu035_u:2448: patito mahāsattvo giri taṭatu so 'gre sthito vyāghryaḥ kṣudhābhibhūtāyāḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2449: muhūrta nirmāsakṛtaḥ sa aṅgaṃ ca asthāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtaḥ rājaputraḥ // Suv_19.61 //
K12bsu035_u:2450: evaṃ ca śrutvā sa vacaḥ sudhāreṃ saṃmūrcchito rāja mahārathaśca /
K12bsu035_u:2451: patitaśca dharaṇīya vinaṣṭacittaḥ śokāgninā prajvalitaḥ sudāruṇā // Suv_19.62 //
K12bsu035_u:2453: sarve sthitā ūrdhvabāhuśca sa kandamānāḥ tṛtīyo 'mātyo nṛpamabravīt // Suv_19.63 //
K12bsu035_u:2454: dṛṣṭau mayādya ubhau kumārau samucchatau tatra mahāvane 'smin /
K12bsu035_u:2455: patitau dharaṇyāṃ ca vinaṣṭacittau asmābhirudakena ca siñcitāni // Suv_19.64 //
K12bsu035_u:2456: yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate punaḥ sthitau hi ādīpta paśyanti diśaścatastraḥ /
K12bsu035_u:2457: muhūrta tiṣṭhanti patanti bhūmau kāruṇasvareṇa paridevayanti // Suv_19.65 //
K12bsu035_u:2460: sa caiva rājā hṛdi dīnacittaḥ putraviyogātsuvikṣiptacittaḥ // Suv_19.66 //
K12bsu035_u:2461: śokapraviddhaḥ paridevayitvā evaṃ hi rājā paridevayanti /
K12bsu035_u:2462: ekaśca me putra priyamanāpaḥ grasta kaniṣṭho vanarākṣasena // Suv_19.67 //
K12bsu035_u:2463: mā me imau anya ca dvau hi putra śokāgninā jīvitasaṃkṣayaṃ vrajet /
K12bsu035_u:2464: yannūna haṃ śīghra vrajeya tatra paśyeya putrau priyadarśanau tau // Suv_19.68 //
K12bsu035_u:2465: śīghreṇa yānena ca rājadhānīṃ praveśayedrājakulānta śīghram /
K12bsu035_u:2466: mā eṣā māturhi janetu kāmaṃ śokāgninā taddhṛdaya sphaṭe tat // Suv_19.69 //
K12bsu035_u:2467: putrau ca dṛṣṭvā labhate praśāntiṃ na jīvitenālabhate viyogam /
K12bsu035_u:2468: rājāpi cāmātyagaṇena sārdhaṃ dvipābhirūḍho gata tatra darśitu // Suv_19.70 //
K12bsu035_u:2469: dṛṣṭvā ca putrau bhrātṛnāmāhvānau karuṇāsvaraṃ krandatau āttamānā /
K12bsu035_u:2470: rājā hi tatputradvayaṃ gṛhītvā prarodamānopi puraṃ vrajitvā /
K12bsu035_u:2471: sā śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāna svaputrāṃ devīṃ adarśetsutaputrakāmām // Suv_19.71 //
K12bsu035_u:2473: ahaṃ ca sa śākyamunistathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsattvavaro babhūva //
K12bsu035_u:2474: putraśca rājño hi mahārathasya yenaiva vyāghrī sukhitā kṛtāsīt // Suv_19.72 //
K12bsu035_u:2475: śuddhodano hi varapārthivendro mahāratho nāma babhūva rājā /
K12bsu035_u:2476: mahiṣī ca āsīdvaramāyadevī mahāpraṇādastatha maitriyo 'bhūt // Suv_19.73 //
K12bsu035_u:2478: vyāghrī abhūttatra mahāprajāpatī vyāghrīsutā pañcaka amī hi bhikṣavaḥ // Suv_19.74 //
K12bsu035_u:2479: atha mahārā ā mahādevī va bahuvidhakaruṇāparidevanaṃ kṛtvā bharaṇānyevamucya mahato
K12bsu035_u:2480: anakāyena sārdhaṃ putrasya śarīrapū āṃ kṛtvāsminpradeśe tasya mahāsattvasyeme śarīrā
K12bsu035_u:2482: tatra devena mahāsattvenāsyai vyāghryā ātmabhāvaṃ parityaktam /
K12bsu035_u:2483: evaṃ rūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ karuṇayā kṛtam /
K12bsu035_u:2484: imaṃ mayā śarīrasya parideśanā 'nāgate 'dhvani gaṇanāsamatikrāntaiḥ kalpaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ buddhakāyaṃ ca kāritā /
K12bsu035_u:2485: asmindeśane nirdiśyamāna aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāḥ pra āyāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K12bsu035_u:2488: sa ca stūpo buddhādhiṣṭhānena tatraivāntardhānamanuprāpta iti //
K12bsu035_u:2493: upasaṃkramya tasya suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭasya tathāgarasya pādau śirasā banditvaikānte sthitāni kṛtāñ alibhūtāni taṃ suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭavitsuḥ //
K12bsu035_u:2495: suvarṇavarṇo girivā munīndra suvarṇavarṇo munipuṇḍarīka // Suv_20.1 //
K12bsu035_u:2497: suvirā itaṃ kāñcanasuprabhāsaṃ sunirmalaṃ saumyamivācalendrama // Suv_20.2 //
K12bsu035_u:2500: sunirmalaṃ suvimalate asuprabhaṃ puṇyaṃ śatalakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaṃ inam /
K12bsu035_u:2508: yacca samupacitapuṇyasaṃcayaṃ tena sattvaḥ prāpnyatu bodhimuttamām // Suv_20.7 //
K12bsu035_u:2509: atha khalu ruciraketubodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prāvaritvā dakṣiṃṇa
K12bsu035_u:2510: ānu maṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñ aliṃ praṇamayitvā tasyāṃ
K12bsu035_u:2517: prasīda me sendrapracaṇḍabhānunā pratapyase sattvasukhācarairiti // Suv_20.10 //
K12bsu035_u:2519: apūrvavarṇo vira o virā ase yathaiva muktaṃ bhramarākulaprabham // Suv_20.11 //
K12bsu035_u:2523: tvayā hi prahlādakarī sukhaṃkarī śubhākaraṃ sarvasukhākarāgamam /
K12bsu035_u:2525: virā ase tvaṃ dyumaṇīrivāṃśubhiḥ yatho valaṃ tvaṃ gagaṇe 'rkamaṇḍalam /
K12bsu035_u:2528: dantāvaliste mukhato virā ate sadrā ahaṃsairiva cāntarīkṣam // Suv_20.15 //
K12bsu035_u:2531: iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarā e sarvatathāgatastavaparivarto nāma viṃśatitamaḥ //
K12bsu035_u:2534: atha khalu bodhisattvasaṃmuccayā nāma kuladevatā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā tasyaṃ velāyāmimābhirgāthābhirbhagavantaṃ tuṣṭāva //
K12bsu035_u:2537: aho aho buddhamanakṣate asaṃ aho aho sāgaramerutulyam /
K12bsu035_u:2538: aho aho buddhamanantagocaraṃ audumbaraṃ puṣpamivātidurlabham // Suv_21.2 //
K12bsu035_u:2540: yena dṛśaṃ bhāṣita sūtramuttamaṃ sarveṣu sattvāmanugrahārtham // Suv_21.3 //
K12bsu035_u:2542: gambhīraśāstā vira ā samādhiḥ yadanupraviṣṭo inabuddhagocare // Suv_21.4 //
K12bsu035_u:2544: te sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtyā ca śūnyāḥ sattvāpi śūnyātma na ātu vidyate // Suv_21.5 //
K12bsu035_u:2546: nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca ina smarāmi nityaṃ ca śocāmi inasya darśanam /
K12bsu035_u:2547: satataṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi saṃbuddha sūryasya ca darśanārtham // Suv_21.6 //
K12bsu035_u:2548: sthāpyeha nityaṃ dharaṇīṣu ānu atiśokatapto 'smi inasya darśane /
K12bsu035_u:2549: rodimi kāruṇyavināyakatvaṃ abhisaṃtṛṣṇāsmi sugatasya darśane // Suv_21.7 //
K12bsu035_u:2550: śokāgninā pra valito 'smi samanta nityaṃ dadāhi me darśanatoya śītalam /
K12bsu035_u:2551: sattvāḥ satṛṣṇāstava rūpadarśane prahlādayenmāṃ karuṇodakena // Suv_21.8 //
K12bsu035_u:2552: kāruṇyabhāvaṃ kuru mahya nāyaka dadāhi me darśana saumyarūpaṃ /
K12bsu035_u:2553: tvayā hi trātā agadeva deśitaḥ śūnyāśca kāyastatha śrāvakāṇām // Suv_21.9 //
K12bsu035_u:2555: sarve ca sattvāḥ supina svabhāvā mahāntaśūnyāḥ svaya nāyakasya // Suv_21.10 //
K12bsu035_u:2557: sādhu sādhu te kuladevate śāstā dadāti sādhu te kuladevate punaśca sādhviti //
